author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_repos_node_location_segments): Oops.  Do some authz checks that

author: xsteve
msg: Allow to use svn-status-use-history without an open *svn-status* buffer

author: xsteve
msg: First steps to support the new functions process-file and start-file-process
(svn-call-process-function): Can be either process-file or call-process

author: glasser
msg: (svn_wc_set_changelist): Change the message for adding a file to a
second changelist to explicitly state that it is being removed from
the previous changelist.  Move the block implementing this after
the "matching_changelist" block (which has a 'continue') so that
we're really committed to the change before making this statement
(although libsvn_client never makes both blocks execute).

author: lgo
msg: (add_file_smartly): internally the fs layer always uses absolute paths, so
make sure o_path starts with '/' too before comparing it to filesystem
